data.description: We are a family owned and family operated bakery cafe located in the heart of Pattaya, Thailand. When we opened for business in 2015, our goal was to provide an affordable daily dining outlet for locals and tourists. "Fresh, Clean, Delicious, and Value" are our commitment to each and every one of our customers everyday. This is our secret sauce and this is what makes us different from others.

data.name: Cafe des Amis Fine Dining

photo.caption: Japanese Scallops with crispay Black Pudding, Chorizo, Apple Puree and fresh Rocket

data.description: We are family owned independent restaurant since 2008. Fine Dining, French and European cuisine. We offer 5 or 6 course Dégustation Menu’s and the largest selection of imported beef from Aus, USA, Japan. as well as some amazing Fish. Snow fish, oysters lobster scallops, large wine list, fine spirits, cocktails, Largest Gin selection in ASIA 180+ Gins, 30 Vodkas, 60 Whiskeys. Indoor and outdoor air conditioned dining areas, Romantic restaurant. Perfect for a birthday anniversary or family celebration. Cafe des Amis is elegant but relaxed and not stuffy or posh. We aspire to the challenges of keeping every customer happy and providing a high class eatery for the area. Our garden terrace dining area is perfect for children. Please use Grab Taxi app to get to us we are located 1km from walking street. Limited Vegetarian available. We have smartly dressed guests celebrating special occasions such as wedding anniversaries. Please respect our Dress Code: Smart Casual, No Flip Flops or beach

data.name: Momento Beach (Restaurant)

photo.caption: Restaurant MOMENTO BEACH : un cadre exceptionnel

data.description: (This is the Restaurant page - For the hotel, see the page MOMENTO RESORT) The MOMENTO BEACH is a restaurant with a French chef. The setting is one of a kind: it's a real little paradise in the heart of Pattaya. Its swimming pool, tropical garden and atypical decoration make it a privileged place to have a good time. Several atmospheres are staged outside or inside - around the pool, - lounges, - private tables, - family tables, - "bar" style, - etc. The restaurant excels in traditional French cuisine. Thai cooks prepare tasty Asian and international dishes. Daily, a daily special "à la minute" is offered by Chef Mathias: something to diversify the pleasures. The restaurant regularly organizes special operations and themed evenings.

data.description: A fine cozy restaurant in a garden and hydroponics salad farm, the one and only in Pattaya. We serve variety of Breakfast, All Day Delicious International and Thai-tasted menu such as fresh hash-brown breakfast, salmon steak, tom-yum-kung, gang-kiew-wan and homemade bakery by our Big Sister. All delicious menus serve with fresh-cut salads from our own farm, Good Farmer Hydroponics. See You Soon^^
